overview: Accused of a crime he did not commit, Tommy decides to take the blame and serve a sentence at Glasgowâ€™s Barlinnie prison, presuming his family will be looked after. However, he finds himself at the mercy of prison life whilst his family are left to fend for themselves. When he is finally released he is forced to pick up the pieces of his life and face the reality of his situation.
title: Wasted Time
